ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c: Silly uninitialized variable bug. Better now
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowColBump.c, zmapWindowMenus.c, zmapWindow_P.h: made unbump all columns work as exepcted
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2010_01_20.shtml: new zmap release notes for 20 January 2010
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2010_01_20.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 20/01/2010
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.23193/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: bump overlap made more compact re RT132505
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: fixed ovbious inefficiency previous overlap bump fix
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowState.c: mod to MarkIsSet warning to prevent further tickets
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapStyle.c: fixed wrong sense < operator error
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowDump.c, zmapWindow_P.h, items/zmapWindowLongItem.c: screenshot to PDF now runs
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapWebBrowser.c: fixed RT122984 and further securitised URLs by patching out shell chars that run extra programs
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindowItem.c, zmapWindowList.c, zmapWindow_P.h: fix dna pasting, needed change to updatepanel func.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowMark_P.h: window mark header file
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindowColConfig.c, zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindowItem.c, zmapWindowMark.c, zmapWindow_P.h, items/zmapWindowContainerBlock.c, items/zmapWindowContainerBlock.h, items/zmapWindowContainerGroup.c, items/zmapWindowContainerUtils.c: Fix for the eternal mark restore issues
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: removing calls to zmapWindowWorld2Seq
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapStyle.h: improve name of one of 3 frame options.
  • src/zmapGFF/zmapGFF2parser.c: add in some missing checking for bad source names etc.
  • src/zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer.c: fix changed name for 3 frame option.
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: fix trivial compiler warning.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindow.c, zmapWindowColBump.c, zmapWindowDNA.c: replace old get feature call with new.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDraw.c: remove double call to colorder/reposition ! fix changed 3 frame name.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: fix bug in showing 3 frame cols.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindowItem.c, zmapWindowItemText.c, zmapWindowMark.c, zmapWindowMenus.c: replace of get feature call with new item version.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowState.c, zmapWindowUtils.c: replace of get feature call with new item version.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/: zmapWindowCanvasItem.c, zmapWindowCanvasItem.h: add new version of get features func, works on sub items now.
  • src/zmapWindow/items/: zmapWindowContainerBlock.c, zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c: fix trivial cast bug.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapView.h, include/ZMap/zmapWindow.h, zmapControl/zmapControlWindowMenubar.c, zmapView/zmapView.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowItemFactory.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowStats.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindow_P.h, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerFeatureSet.c, zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerUtils_P.h: restored session statistics, needs review
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDrawFeatures.c: remove needless call to FullReposition, as RequestReposition is called by it, and again only a few lines later in this function!
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowNavigator.c: Only request a reposition if were exposed. i.e. no expose handler
  • src/zmapWindow/items/zmapWindowContainerContext.c: Fixes, slow response to first click on the canvas. Why is it that bugs like this are the smallest diffs?
  • src/zmapServer/pipe/pipeServer.c: sanitised some type cast code for 63 bit systems
  • src/: zmapFeature/zmapFeature.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowDraw.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowStats.c: added assembly_path to stats and also addFeatureModeCB ( )
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowStats.c: fix bug causing crash in stats code.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTypes.c: defaults for 3 frame wrong so fixed them.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColBump.c: partial fix bumping for 3 frame translation, columns remain too big on zoom.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapWebBrowser.c: really fixed query urls by quoting the URL with backslash-quotes
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapWebBrowser.c: fixed double free in web broswer interface
